name: Aero UI (Windows 7)
description:
This is a kit for creating Windows 7 experiences. It includes a component library and examples of how the components are used.


Changelog

2.7 - Removed the accidentally created Workshop. Added more states to Radio Button and Superbar. Improved accuracy.

2.6.1 - Modified the Table of Contents to reflect the changes made in Release 2.6. Fixed minor inaccuracies.

2.6 - Added Tinted Glass and Tinted App Window. Fixed minor ratio inconsistencies.

2.5.3 - Fixed toolkit thumbnail. Renamed toolkit.

2.5.2 - Fixed Community listing tags.

2.5.1 - Fixed Radio Button's 'Copy me' section.

2.5 - Added Checkbox, Radio Button, Text Field and File Menu. Improved accuracy.

2.0 - New navigation system, similar to Microsoft design toolkits. Improved accuracy.

1.7 - Added SVG for Start orb. Added navigation buttons.

1.6 - Minor fixes.

1.5 - Added dial slider. Greatly improved accuracy of models.

1.0 - Official release.


Any problems or suggestions? Signal them on my Discord or mention me at @dlphesigns on Twitter.
